name: Octillery
author: Yuka Morii
flavor_text: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

abilities.name: Suction Cup Draw
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Smokescreen Shot
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn’t happen.
